section.title: Getting Started
section.para:
If you have never used &TeX; before, then it is recommendable
local guide
to work through one of the &TeX;/&LaTeX; tutorials. A good starting point is this entry in the UK &TeX; &FAQ;: http://www.tex.ac.uk/cgi-bin/texfaq2html?label=tutorials*.
&MiKTeX; doesn't differ very much from any other &TeX; system you might have used before. Typesetting with &MiKTeX; involves these steps:

step.para:
Press Ctrl T
to create a typeset view of your document.
